title: Tall, Dark & Handsome
description: It is 1998, Nancy is looking for romance, an eccentric fortune teller reads her palm and tells her that she will marry a tall, dark, handsome man. Eighteen-year-old Nancy is starting her first year as a Drama University student and wants to find true love. Nancy makes friends with Sharon who is loud and always gives her opinion, whether you want it or not, but is the friend that will always have your back, and James who is thoughtful and intelligent and has an excellent sense of style, except in music and his choice of teapots! .Sharon and James accompany Nancy on destiny’s path to true love. Will Nancy meet the man of her dreams and will he be tall, dark and handsome, or is that just cliché! Will her fortune come true or will the hand of fate intervene?Tall, Dark and Handsome is a debut romance novel, with sexy times and uses some colourful language including the F-word!
author: Ellie Rose Hawkins
